subject: Implement Deletion with Preview
description:
Create soft delete with dependency awareness:
1. Create /home/ken/control-plane-api/src/app/api/projects/[id]/deletion-preview/route.ts
2. Add deleted_at, deletion_scheduled_at, grace_period_ends_at columns
3. Calculate dependencies: schemas, api_keys, webhooks, edge_functions, storage_buckets, secrets
4. Show preview with what will be deleted and impact
5. Implement 30-day grace period before hard delete
6. Create restore functionality during grace period
7. Update deletion API to use soft delete first

This builds trust by showing exactly what will happen.
